text: Egils Levits (born 30 June 1955) is a Latvian lawyer, political scientist and judge. He was the 10th President of Latvia from July 8, 2019 to July 8, 2023.13\. Saeimas balsojums par Egilu Levitu. He was a Member of the European Court of Justice from 2004 until his election as Latvian President in 2019. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Latvia Category:Current national leaders Category:Judges Category:European lawyers Category:Political scientists Category:People from Riga
title: Egils Levits
